author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-2957: Renamed carrot2-core to org.apache.solr:solr-carrot2-core:<solr-version>; enabled maven filtering of solr-carrot2-core pom to substitute the project version in the POM for local installation through the 'bootstrap' profile; included solr-carrot2-core jar in generate-maven-artifacts
